_description: A lament for worldly bliss — one couplet in John Grimestone’s sermon book

NLS18721.Transcription:
Allas allas þis werdis blisse lestet but a stoundeÞe laste
                    hende þeroffe with sorwe is ibounde
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 22.
